Class AlbumController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.Controller
      • controllers.AlbumController

  • public class AlbumController
extends Controller
    Loads scene for opening an album loaded from UserController

    Nick, Nithin

      • start

        public void start​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage,
                  Album album,
                  User user,
                  Admin admin)
        sets the scene on primary Stage and stores params in class
        Parameters:
        primaryStage - stage for each scene
        album - album to be loaded
        user - user that the album belongs to
        admin - admin object that the user belongs to
